description:
While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
Gyakuten no Itte! Fushichou Marco no Honoo
Kehrtwende des Schicksals! – Die Flammen von Marco dem Phönix
Retournement de situation ! Les flammes de Marco le Phénix
逆転の一手! 不死鳥マルコの炎
